projects.name: Onboard Pro - Developer Onboarding Tool
projects.description: A cross-platform command-line developer onboarding tool written in C# that automates the setup of consistent development environments across Windows, macOS, Ubuntu, and WSL. The tool uses dependency injection for testability, implements platform-specific orchestrators, and provides idempotent onboarding steps. Migrating from a monolithic PowerShell script to a maintainable, testable, and extensible C# architecture.

tasks.name: Iteration 1: Project Scaffolding & Foundational Setup
tasks.details: Completed in PR #2 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/2). Solution/projects scaffolding merged to main with CI green.

tasks.name: Iteration 2: Core Abstractions & Services
tasks.details: Completed in PR #3 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/3). Core abstractions and services merged with green CI.

tasks.name: Iteration 3: Dependency Injection & The Composition Root
tasks.details: Completed in PR #4 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/4). Composition root and orchestrator selection merged with CI success.

tasks.name: Iteration 4: The First Onboarding Step (Git Identity)
tasks.details: Completed in PR #5 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/5). ConfigureGitUserStep plus tooling merged after CI success.

tasks.name: Iteration 5: The First Platform-Aware Step (Install VS Code)
tasks.details: PlatformAware framework and InstallVsCodeStep delivered in PR #6 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/6). Covered by InstallVsCodeStep NUnit tests and verified with dotnet format/build/test locally. CI run 18850560778 succeeded on main workflow.

tasks.name: Iteration 6: Windows Host Onboarding
tasks.details: Windows orchestrator now exercises all platform-specific steps, and automated coverage (WindowsOrchestratorTests) verifies idempotent behaviour along with failure surfacing. Step-level NUnit suites remain green, and the orchestrator loop was refactored to SequentialOrchestrator for consistent user messaging. Validated via `dotnet build` and `dotnet test` on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Iteration 7: WSL Guest Onboarding
tasks.details: Completed Iteration 7 via PR #9 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/9): finalized --mode flag parsing, added WSL guest steps (apt update, prerequisites, credential helper) with NUnit coverage, and wired the orchestrator + DI. CI run 18856375172 green.

tasks.name: Iteration 8: macOS & Ubuntu Onboarding
tasks.details: Implement the orchestrators for native macOS and Ubuntu. Create InstallHomebrewStep, InstallBrewPackagesStep for macOS, and InstallAptPackagesStep for Ubuntu. Configure both orchestrators with their respective steps.

tasks.name: Iteration 9: Project Cloning Step
tasks.details: Create the final major onboarding step to clone the project repository. Implement CloneProjectRepoStep with logic to clone or update the repository, handling edge cases like existing non-Git directories.

tasks.name: Iteration 10: Bootstrapper & Release Workflow
tasks.details: Bootstrapper scripts (setup.sh/setup.ps1) finalized with environment overrides, and the release workflow now uploads platform binaries from absolute workspace paths; the follow-up CI run for PR #13 succeeded. Validated end-to-end via `dotnet build onboard-pro/Onboard.sln`, `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln`, and GitHub Actions run 18859342536 on 2025-10-27.

tasks.name: Iteration 11: Final Documentation and Polish
tasks.details: Final documentation delivered (README.md quick-starts, architecture overview), user messaging polished through SequentialOrchestrator, and top-level error handling hardened with OnboardingStepException plus ProcessRunner resilience. Verified by `dotnet build onboard-pro/Onboard.sln`, `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln`, and manual README review on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Create the Root Directory and Solution
tasks.details: Create onboard-pro directory and initialize .NET solution. Run: dotnet new sln -n Onboard

tasks.name: Initialize .NET Projects
tasks.details: Create all three projects: Onboard.Console (console app), Onboard.Core (class library), and Onboard.Core.Tests (nunit test project) in their respective directories.

tasks.name: Link Projects to Solution
tasks.details: Add all three projects to the solution using dotnet sln add commands.

tasks.name: Establish Project References
tasks.details: Set up project references: Onboard.Console references Onboard.Core, and Onboard.Core.Tests references Onboard.Core.

tasks.name: Install NuGet Packages
tasks.details: Install Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting for Onboard.Console and Moq for Onboard.Core.Tests using dotnet add package commands.

tasks.name: Create Directory Structure
tasks.details: Create complete directory structure: Orchestrators/, Abstractions/, Models/, Services/, Steps/ with subdirectories (Shared/, PlatformAware/, Windows/, WslGuest/, MacOs/).

tasks.name: Configure Dev Container
tasks.details: Create .devcontainer/devcontainer.json configured to use mcr.microsoft.com/devcontainers/dotnet:1-9.0-bookworm image with proper extensions and settings.

tasks.name: Define Models
tasks.details: Create ProcessResult and PlatformFacts records in Models/ folder with all required properties and enums (OperatingSystem, Architecture).

tasks.name: Define Abstractions (Interfaces)
tasks.details: Create all core interfaces: IProcessRunner, IUserInteraction, IPlatformDetector, IOnboardingStep, IPlatformOrchestrator in Abstractions/ folder.

tasks.name: Implement Concrete Services
tasks.details: Implement ProcessRunner using System.Diagnostics.Process, ConsoleUserInteraction with colored output, and PlatformDetector using RuntimeInformation and WSL environment variable detection.

tasks.name: Implement Program.cs with DI
tasks.details: Replace Program.cs with DI configuration, register all services, create placeholder orchestrators (WindowsOrchestrator, MacOsOrchestrator, UbuntuOrchestrator, WslGuestOrchestrator), and implement platform-based orchestrator selection.

tasks.name: Create Placeholder Orchestrators
tasks.details: Create empty placeholder orchestrator classes with empty ExecuteAsync methods to validate DI registration works correctly.

tasks.name: Test Platform Detection and Orchestrator Selection
tasks.details: Test the application runs correctly on current platform, detects OS/architecture, selects appropriate orchestrator, and exits gracefully.

tasks.name: Implement ConfigureGitUserStep
tasks.details: Implement ConfigureGitUserStep.cs in Steps/Shared/ with ShouldExecuteAsync checking git config, and ExecuteAsync prompting user and setting git config values.

tasks.name: Write Unit Tests for ConfigureGitUserStep
tasks.details: Create ConfigureGitUserStepTests.cs with tests for happy path (missing config), skip path (config exists), and verify Moq usage for IProcessRunner and IUserInteraction.

tasks.name: Update Orchestrators with ConfigureGitUserStep
tasks.details: Update all orchestrators to inject ConfigureGitUserStep and add it to their steps collection. Verify it runs correctly.

tasks.name: Implement PlatformAwareStep Base Class
tasks.details: Implemented PlatformAwareStep base class in src/Onboard.Core/Steps/PlatformAware/PlatformAwareStep.cs with strategy registration and execution helpers. Covered by InstallVsCodeStep unit tests in tests/Onboard.Core.Tests/Steps/InstallVsCodeStepTests.cs. Shipped via PR #6 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/6) with green CI (run 18850560778).

tasks.name: Implement InstallVsCodeStep
tasks.details: Implemented InstallVsCodeStep with winget/brew/apt strategies and idempotent detection using IProcessRunner in src/Onboard.Core/Steps/PlatformAware/InstallVsCodeStep.cs, added DI wiring in all orchestrators, and created NUnit coverage in tests/Onboard.Core.Tests/Steps/InstallVsCodeStepTests.cs. Delivered in PR #6 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/6) with CI run 18850560778 succeeding.

tasks.name: Create Windows-Specific Steps
tasks.details: Implemented EnableWslFeaturesStep, InstallGitForWindowsStep, and InstallDockerDesktopStep under src/Onboard.Core/Steps/Windows/. Added NUnit coverage in tests/Onboard.Core.Tests/Steps/Windows/*. Shipped via PR #7 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/7) with local dotnet format/build/test passing. WSL step only verifies prerequisites and prints manual instructions as requested.

tasks.name: Update WindowsOrchestrator with All Steps
tasks.details: WindowsOrchestrator now injects EnableWslFeaturesStep, InstallGitForWindowsStep, InstallVsCodeStep, InstallDockerDesktopStep, and ConfigureGitUserStep in order, powered by the new DI registrations in Program.cs.

tasks.name: Test Windows Host Onboarding
tasks.details: Covered Windows orchestrator behaviour with automated tests (WindowsOrchestratorTests) using a controlled process runner to simulate pre-configured machines and failure paths. The tests confirm steps remain idempotent and surface contextual errors and are executed via `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln` on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Finalize --mode Flag Parsing
tasks.details: Introduced CommandLineOptionsParser with robust --mode parsing (supports --mode wsl-guest and --mode=wsl-guest, rejects duplicates/invalid values) and wired it into Program.cs to show friendly errors. Added NUnit coverage in tests/Onboard.Core.Tests/Services/CommandLineOptionsParserTests.cs. Verified via dotnet build and dotnet test. Landed in PR #8 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/8) with CI run 18855944783 succeeding before squash merge. Task complete.

tasks.name: Create WSL-Specific Steps
tasks.details: Implemented AptUpdateStep, InstallWslPrerequisitesStep, and ConfigureWslGitCredentialHelperStep under src/Onboard.Core/Steps/WslGuest with NUnit coverage in tests/Onboard.Core.Tests/Steps/WslGuest/*. Verified locally via dotnet build/test and merged into PR #9 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/9). CI run 18856375172 for PR #9 succeeded.

tasks.name: Update WslGuestOrchestrator with All Steps
tasks.details: Wired AptUpdateStep, InstallWslPrerequisitesStep, InstallVsCodeStep, ConfigureWslGitCredentialHelperStep, and ConfigureGitUserStep into WslGuestOrchestrator with matching DI registrations in Program.cs. Changes shipped via PR #9 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/9) with CI run 18856375172 succeeding.

tasks.name: Create macOS-Specific Steps
tasks.details: Create InstallHomebrewStep checking for brew on PATH. Create InstallBrewPackagesStep to install git, gh, chezmoi via brew.

tasks.name: Create Ubuntu-Specific Steps
tasks.details: Create InstallAptPackagesStep for Ubuntu to install git, gh, curl, chezmoi, python3, build-essential via apt-get.

tasks.name: Update macOS & Ubuntu Orchestrators
tasks.details: Update MacOsOrchestrator with InstallHomebrewStep, InstallBrewPackagesStep, InstallVsCodeStep, ConfigureGitUserStep. Update UbuntuOrchestrator with AptUpdateStep, InstallAptPackagesStep, InstallVsCodeStep, ConfigureGitUserStep.

tasks.name: Implement CloneProjectRepoStep
tasks.details: Implement CloneProjectRepoStep.cs in Steps/Shared/ with logic to check if directory exists, if it's a Git repo, clone new repo or git pull if exists. Handle parent directory creation.

tasks.name: Update Orchestrators with CloneProjectRepoStep
tasks.details: Add CloneProjectRepoStep to MacOsOrchestrator, UbuntuOrchestrator, and WslGuestOrchestrator as final step before docs. Test end-to-end.

tasks.name: Create setup.sh Bootstrapper
tasks.details: Implemented cross-platform bootstrapper at setup.sh. Script now detects host OS/arch, queries GitHub Releases for Onboard-${os}-${arch} assets, downloads with curl, and executes with args passthrough. Supports ONBOARD_REPOSITORY/ONBOARD_RELEASE_TAG/ONBOARD_KEEP_DOWNLOADED_BINARY env overrides and cleans temp files unless preserve flag set. Validated via dotnet build && dotnet test.

tasks.name: Create setup.ps1 Bootstrapper
tasks.details: Extended setup.ps1 to honor ONBOARD_RELEASE_TAG and ONBOARD_KEEP_DOWNLOADED_BINARY environment variables while retaining parameter overrides. Cleanup flow now reuses a computed preserve flag so temp executables are removed by default and preserved only when requested. Exercised dotnet build && dotnet test to ensure repo remains healthy.

tasks.name: Create GitHub Actions Release Workflow
tasks.details: Reworked .github/workflows/release.yml into a matrix build covering win-x64, osx-x64, osx-arm64, and linux-x64. Each job publishes a self-contained single-file binary, renames it to a platform-specific asset (e.g. Onboard-linux-x64), uploads a workflow artifact, and attaches the asset to tagged releases. Generate_release_notes now runs once on the Windows leg. Verified solution health with dotnet build && dotnet test.

tasks.name: Create README.md
tasks.details: Expanded README.md with quick-start bootstrap instructions, architecture overview, release workflow summary, and development commands. Validated via `dotnet build onboard-pro/Onboard.sln` and `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln`.

tasks.name: Review User-Facing Text
tasks.details: Standardized orchestrator output by introducing SequentialOrchestrator, ensuring consistent "Checking/Running/Already configured" messages and uniform completion headers across platforms. Verified user messaging via new automated coverage in WindowsOrchestratorTests, executed with `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln` on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Error Handling Review
tasks.details: Added top-level exception handling in Program.Main to convert onboarding failures into friendly error output and non-zero exit codes, and introduced OnboardingStepException so individual steps bubble contextual failures. ProcessRunner now gracefully returns a failure ProcessResult when launches fail. Validated via `dotnet test onboard-pro/Onboard.sln` on 2025-10-28.

tasks.name: Update WindowsOrchestrator wiring
tasks.details: Updated WindowsOrchestrator to execute EnableWslFeaturesStep, InstallGitForWindowsStep, InstallVsCodeStep, InstallDockerDesktopStep, and ConfigureGitUserStep, and registered the new steps in Program.cs for dependency injection.

tasks.name: Author Windows bootstrap scripts
tasks.details: Handled via PR #8 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/8). Added setup.ps1 to fetch the latest Windows release asset, executes it with arg passthrough, and introduced a stub setup.sh directing users to the PowerShell bootstrapper. Workflow run 18854470533 passed.

tasks.name: Create CI release pipeline
tasks.details: Completed in PR #8 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/8). Added .github/workflows/release.yml which publishes a win-x64 self-contained executable, stores it as a workflow artifact, and attaches it to tagged releases. CI run 18854470533 is green.

tasks.details: Validated the new setup.ps1 against legacy-codebase/setup.ps1, added execution policy bypass helper, and corrected default repo slug in commit e98d039 (PR #8). Confirmed parity of download, checksum, and launch behavior.

tasks.name: Automate Docker Desktop WSL integration
tasks.details: Automated Docker Desktop WSL integration in InstallDockerDesktopStep (commit e98d039, PR #8), including settings-store.json updates and NUnit coverage. Verified via dotnet test and CI run 18855257300.

tasks.name: Produce Windows release artifact
tasks.details: Tagged commit e98d039 with v0.1.0, pushed to origin, and verified release workflow run 18855448753 succeeded. Artifact windows-executable (id 4386759021) and release asset Onboard-win-x64.exe published at https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/releases/tag/v0.1.0.

tasks.details: Planning complete: iter-12 branch created, scope reviewed, and implementation approach locked before coding started.

tasks.name: 20 Build & Document
tasks.details: ProcessRunner env injection, Serilog host pipeline, logging instrumentation, transcript capture, and documentation/tests all implemented per Iteration 12 scope.

tasks.name: Add DEBIAN_FRONTEND injection to ProcessRunner
tasks.details: Completed: ProcessRunner.cs now automatically injects DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive on Linux hosts. Implementation includes proper environment variable detection to preserve existing values. Verified via ProcessRunnerTests with Linux-specific test coverage checking both injection and preservation behaviors.

tasks.name: Integrate Serilog file logging pipeline
tasks.details: Completed: Serilog and Serilog.Sinks.File packages added to Onboard.Console via Directory.Packages.props (v4.0.0 and v6.0.0 respectively). Program.cs now configures UseSerilog with file output to {temp}/onboard-pro.log at Debug level, with 1-second flush intervals and single file retention. ILogger<T> is available throughout the DI container.

tasks.name: Instrument ProcessRunner command logging
tasks.details: Completed: ProcessRunner now injects ILogger<ProcessRunner> and logs all command executions at Debug level. Logs include: command/arguments at start, exit code/truncated stdout/stderr (max 1024 chars) on completion, and exceptions on failure. Verified via ProcessRunnerTests.RunAsync_LogsCommandLifecycle test using InMemoryLogger test double.

tasks.name: Extend ConsoleUserInteraction transcript logging
tasks.details: Completed: ConsoleUserInteraction now accepts ILogger<ConsoleUserInteraction> via constructor and logs all user-facing output through LogTranscript helper. All WriteLine, WriteHeader, WriteSuccess, WriteWarning, WriteError, and Prompt calls are mirrored to the logger with appropriate categories (INFO, HEADER, SUCCESS, WARNING, ERROR, PROMPT, PROMPT_RESPONSE). Verified via ConsoleUserInteractionTests with InMemoryLogger assertions.

tasks.name: Integrate logging enhancements
tasks.details: Consolidate Iteration 12 coding changes (ProcessRunner env injection, Serilog configuration, command logging, and transcript logging) and verify the solution builds successfully.

tasks.name: Update README with diagnostics guidance

tasks.name: Update troubleshooting guidance for diagnostics
tasks.details: Add documentation covering log file locations, retention expectations, and instructions for attaching logs to support tickets.

tasks.details: Deliver Iteration 15 enhancements from prds/iterations.md by adding a --verbose CLI flag, extending IUserInteraction with debug output, instrumenting ProcessRunner for verbose/dry-run transparency, and improving SequentialOrchestrator dry-run messaging.

tasks.name: Iteration 16: Spectre Presentation Layer
tasks.details:
Goal: Replace the legacy console interaction layer with a Spectre.Console-driven implementation while keeping the core library free of UI dependencies. Scope:
- Extend IUserInteraction with rich output APIs (WriteNormal/Success/Warning/Error/Debug, ShowWelcomeBanner, ShowSummary, RunStatusAsync, Ask, Confirm) and introduce the IStatusContext abstraction for spinner updates without leaking Spectre types.
- Add shared UX primitives in Onboard.Core.Models (StepStatus enum and StepResult record) to support completion summaries.
- Relocate console presentation into Onboard.Console by removing ConsoleUserInteraction from Onboard.Core, creating SpectreUserInteraction that implements the new contract using Spectre.Console, referencing the Spectre.Console package, and wiring the service into the DI container.

tasks.name: 10 Planning
tasks.details: Turn the iteration16.md scope into an actionable checklist. Define how the IUserInteraction surface expands, how IStatusContext is represented without leaking Spectre types, the location and structure of StepResult/StepStatus, and the sequence for moving ConsoleUserInteraction into Onboard.Console. Capture dependencies on package references, DI updates, and any temporary adapters needed for legacy tests.

tasks.name: 10.10 Create iteration branch "iter-16"
tasks.details: Branch from main to iter-16 to isolate Spectre.Console UX polish work.

tasks.name: 10.20 Finalize Spectre.Console rollout plan
tasks.details: Produce the detailed rollout doc covering: interface method signatures, new IStatusContext API contracts, StepResult/StepStatus placement, SpectreUserInteraction responsibilities, temporary shims for existing tests, and the order of commits. Share planning notes with reviewers before build starts.

tasks.name: 20 Build & Document
tasks.details: Deliver the Iteration 16 Spectre presentation layer changes across Onboard.Core and Onboard.Console: expand abstractions, add StepResult models, implement SpectreUserInteraction plus status adapters, register dependencies, and keep the core library free of UI references.

tasks.name: 20.10 Extend IUserInteraction & add IStatusContext
tasks.details: Expand Onboard.Core/Abstractions/IUserInteraction.cs with the richer contract (WriteNormal/Success/Warning/Error/Debug, ShowWelcomeBanner, ShowSummary, RunStatusAsync, Ask, Confirm) and introduce Onboard.Core/Abstractions/IStatusContext.cs to expose spinner updates without leaking Spectre types. Update any compile-time references and document default behaviours expected by downstream orchestrators.

tasks.name: 20.20 Create SpectreUserInteraction
tasks.details: Remove ConsoleUserInteraction from Onboard.Core and add Onboard.Console/Services/SpectreUserInteraction.cs implementing the expanded IUserInteraction interface. Use Spectre.Console primitives for semantic colors, prompts, status contexts, and welcome/summary output. Ensure constructors accept injected IAnsiConsole/IConfiguration as needed without introducing Spectre dependencies into Onboard.Core.

tasks.name: 20.30 Add StepResult model
tasks.details: Create Onboard.Core/Models/StepResult.cs containing the StepStatus enum (Executed, Skipped, Failed) and the StepResult record with step name, status, optional skip reason, and failure details. Ensure the model lives in Onboard.Core so orchestrators can consume it without UI dependencies. Update project files and namespaces accordingly.

tasks.name: 20.40 Build Spectre status context adapter
tasks.details: Implement an internal adapter inside Onboard.Console that bridges IUserInteraction.RunStatusAsync to Spectre.Console's Status API. Provide an IStatusContext implementation that proxies update messages, cancellation, and progress reporting without leaking Spectre types to Onboard.Core. Unit-test the adapter at the service level once Spectre.Console.Testing is available.

tasks.name: 20.50 Register Spectre dependencies
tasks.details: Add the Spectre.Console package reference to Onboard.Console, register SpectreUserInteraction and supporting adapters in Program.cs, and ensure dependency injection keeps Onboard.Core free of Spectre references. Update composition root tests or bootstrapping smoke checks to cover the registration changes.

tasks.name: 20.60 Ensure Onboard.Core remains UI-agnostic
tasks.details: Sweep Onboard.Core for lingering ConsoleUserInteraction references, adjust project files to remove Spectre dependencies, and update any helper classes or factories that previously lived in the core library. Confirm the build outputs show a clean separation between Onboard.Core (no Spectre) and Onboard.Console (Spectre-aware).

tasks.name: 20.70 Prepare Spectre.Console testing harness
tasks.details: Add the Spectre.Console.Testing dependency to the test project, create helper fakes/mocks for IAnsiConsole and IStatusContext, and update existing unit tests to compile after the IUserInteraction expansion. Defer the full SpectreUserInteraction coverage to Iteration 17 but ensure the plumbing is in place.

tasks.name: 20.90 Implement changes for iter-16
tasks.details: Wrap up Iteration 16 implementation work on branch iter-16: ensure IUserInteraction expansion, StepResult models, SpectreUserInteraction, adapters, DI changes, and testing scaffolding all compile together. Capture commit notes for hand-off to Iteration 17.

tasks.name: 30 Local Validation
tasks.details: Validate Iteration 16 Spectre presentation changes locally with automated suites and targeted Spectre runs before opening the PR.

tasks.name: Open PR: iter-16
tasks.details: Publish draft PR for Spectre.Console UX polish capturing UX demos, screenshots, and architecture notes.

tasks.name: Cross-platform Spectre runtime spot-check
tasks.details: Run Onboard.Console on Windows, macOS, and Linux environments to confirm SpectreUserInteraction initializes, status adapter runs, and no Spectre types leak into Onboard.Core before publishing the PR.

tasks.name: 40 Delivery & CI
tasks.details: Push Iteration 16 Spectre presentation changes for review and keep PR CI green.

tasks.name: Local full-suite lint/test & dry-run
tasks.details: Run dotnet format, dotnet build, and dotnet test on iter-16. Exercise Onboard.Console with the new SpectreUserInteraction in dry-run mode to ensure the presentation layer initializes without the sequential orchestration changes planned for Iteration 17.

tasks.name: Implement/update unit tests
tasks.details: Update or add tests to cover the expanded IUserInteraction contract, Spectre status adapter, and DI wiring so the new presentation layer is exercised.

tasks.name: Manual Spectre UX smoke test
tasks.details: Manually exercise SpectreUserInteraction via harness or dry-run to confirm welcome banner, semantic colors, and status updates behave before orchestrator integration lands in Iteration 17.

tasks.name: Update architecture documentation
tasks.details: Document the Spectre presentation layer architecture, including IUserInteraction changes, IStatusContext, and the new separation between Onboard.Core and Onboard.Console.

tasks.name: Update README & troubleshooting guidance
tasks.details: Refresh README/troubleshooting content to explain the Spectre-based interaction layer, logging expectations, and any interim gaps before Iteration 17.

tasks.name: Publish v0.2.0 release from main
tasks.details: Tag the current main HEAD, run the release workflow, and confirm assets published. Update notes once complete.

tasks.name: Iteration 17: UX-Oriented Orchestration
tasks.details:
Goal: Integrate the new Spectre-based interaction APIs into the orchestration pipeline to deliver the polished spinner workflow and completion summary described in prds/iterations/iteration17.md. Scope:
- Update SequentialOrchestrator to drive execution through IUserInteraction.RunStatusAsync, emit Spectre markup for step lifecycle events, collect StepResult data, and present a completion summary.
- Enhance Program.cs startup to display a Spectre welcome banner with resolved OS/architecture before invoking the orchestrator, and ensure platform-specific orchestrators provide spinner-friendly descriptions plus skip reasons.
- Refresh unit tests to mock the expanded IUserInteraction (including RunStatusAsync), and add SpectreUserInteractionTests via Spectre.Console.Testing to verify success/skipped/error markup output and summary behaviour.

tasks.name: 10 Planning
tasks.details: Define the orchestration integration plan: map SequentialOrchestrator changes, decide how StepResult data flows into summaries, outline Program.cs welcome banner work, and sequence testing updates. Capture risks around spinner messaging and skip reason surfacing.

tasks.name: 10.10 Create iteration branch "iter-17"
tasks.details: Branch from main to iter-17 once the planning outline is approved so orchestration UX changes stay isolated until reviewed.

tasks.name: 10.20 Finalize orchestration UX plan
tasks.details: Document sequencing for SequentialOrchestrator updates, Program.cs banner changes, orchestrator skip reason wiring, and test coverage additions. Share the plan with reviewers for sign-off before build starts.

tasks.name: 20 Build & Document
tasks.details: Implement the Iteration 17 orchestration UX updates across SequentialOrchestrator, Program.cs, and platform-specific orchestrators.

tasks.name: 20.10 Enhance SequentialOrchestrator status flow
tasks.details: Refactor SequentialOrchestrator to run each step inside IUserInteraction.RunStatusAsync, emit Spectre markup for start/success/warning/error states, and ensure spinner updates pause cleanly for prompts.

tasks.name: 20.20 Collect StepResult data & ShowSummary
tasks.details: Augment SequentialOrchestrator to populate StepResult entries for each step (executed, skipped with reason, failed with exception) and call IUserInteraction.ShowSummary with aggregated results after execution.

tasks.name: 20.30 Update Program.cs startup experience
tasks.details: Call IUserInteraction.ShowWelcomeBanner in Program.cs with the resolved OS/architecture before dispatching to the platform orchestrator. Ensure the banner uses Spectre markup and that dependency injection surfaces ExecutionOptions or PlatformFacts as needed.

tasks.name: 20.40 Surface orchestrator status metadata
tasks.details: Update each platform-specific orchestrator to supply spinner-friendly step descriptions and capture human-readable skip reasons that populate StepResult entries for summary output.

tasks.name: 20.50 Polish Spectre summary output
tasks.details: Update SpectreUserInteraction.ShowSummary to render executed/skipped/failed steps with Spectre tables or markup consistent with the UX plan, including skip reasons and failure details sourced from StepResult.

tasks.name: 20.90 Implement changes for iter-17
tasks.details: Wrap up Iteration 17 implementation work on branch iter-17: ensure SequentialOrchestrator, Program.cs, platform orchestrators, and Spectre summaries all build together and are ready for validation.

tasks.name: 30 Local Validation
tasks.details: Validate Iteration 17 orchestrator UX updates locally through automated suites and representative Spectre runs before opening the PR.

tasks.name: Open PR: iter-17
tasks.details: Open a draft PR for iter-17 showcasing the spinner workflow, welcome banner, and completion summary screenshots or recordings.

tasks.name: Cross-platform spinner workflow spot-check
tasks.details: Run Onboard.Console on Windows, macOS, and Linux (or containers) to confirm spinner flow, skip messaging, and completion summary behave consistently with real orchestrators.

tasks.name: 40 Delivery & CI
tasks.details: Push Iteration 17 orchestrator UX changes for review and keep PR CI runs green.

tasks.name: Local full-suite lint/test & dry-run
tasks.details: Run dotnet format, dotnet build, and dotnet test on iter-17, then execute the onboarding flow in dry-run mode to validate spinner messaging and summary output end-to-end.

tasks.name: Implement/update unit tests
tasks.details: Refresh orchestrator and interaction tests to mock RunStatusAsync flows, verify StepResult collection, and cover new summary output paths.

tasks.name: Add SpectreUserInteraction tests
tasks.details: Add Spectre.Console.Testing-based coverage to verify SpectreUserInteraction markup for success, skipped, and error cases plus summary rendering.

tasks.name: Update README & quick-start docs
tasks.details: Update README and quick-start instructions to highlight the Spectre spinner workflow and completion summary experience.

tasks.name: Update architecture documentation
tasks.details: Revise architecture and UX references to explain SequentialOrchestrator status flow, StepResult summary output, and platform skip reasons.

tasks.name: 30 Local Validation
tasks.details: dotnet format/build/test and dry-run executed successfully on iter-12 branch prior to delivery; results captured in local validation notes.

tasks.name: 40 Delivery & CI
tasks.details: Delivery complete: PR #18 opened for Iteration 12 and ci workflow run 18882752801 finished green. No outstanding follow-up actions.

tasks.name: Implement/update unit tests
tasks.details: Add/update unit tests for ProcessRunner Linux behavior, Serilog integration, command logging, and ConsoleUserInteraction transcript capture.

tasks.name: Update architecture documentation
tasks.details: Update architecture documentation to reflect new logging capabilities, configuration locations, and diagnostics workflows.

tasks.name: Local full-suite lint/test & dry-run
tasks.details: Execute dotnet format, dotnet build, dotnet test, and orchestrator dry-run to verify ProcessRunner, Serilog, and logging changes work correctly.

tasks.name: Open PR: iter-12
tasks.details: Opened PR #18 (https://github.com/kevinaud/onboard-v2/pull/18) for iteration 12 reliability & diagnostics work after validating code, tests, and documentation updates.

tasks.name: Monitor CI & Resolve Failures
tasks.details: GitHub Actions run 18882752801 for PR #18 completed successfully (ci workflow). No follow-up fixes required.

tasks.name: Monitor CI & Resolve Failures
tasks.details: Track iter-13 CI runs, investigate any failures, and push fixes until all checks are green.

tasks.name: Monitor CI & Resolve Failures
tasks.details: Watch iter-14 PR workflows and push fixes until all CI checks pass.

tasks.details: Watch iter-15 PR workflows and push fixes until all CI checks pass.

tasks.name: Monitor CI & Resolve Failures
tasks.details: Watch iter-16 PR workflows and push fixes until all CI checks pass.

tasks.name: Monitor CI & Resolve Failures
tasks.details: Watch iter-17 PR workflows and push fixes until all CI checks pass.

tasks.name: Update README & troubleshooting guidance
tasks.details: Update README and troubleshooting docs to describe centralized configuration defaults and how to adjust them.
